content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the price. What would you consider a fair rent for this place?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. It's a nice place, and I believe it could be a good fit for me. Regarding the price, I'm looking for a reasonable offer that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you please tell me your starting price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Wang. I believe the quality of this apartment warrants a higher price. However, I'm willing to negotiate a fair deal with you. Let's start at €750 per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your starting price is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. I'm sure you understand that as a student, I'm looking for a price that is both fair and affordable. Could we perhaps discuss a lower starting point?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Of course, Mr. Wang. I'm here to negotiate a mutually beneficial agreement. How about we start at €700 per month? This is still a very competitive price for the location and the amenities offered. What are your thoughts on this new starting point?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €700 is more in line with what I had in mind. However, considering that the apartment is unfurnished, I was hoping for a price closer to €650. This would align better with my budget as a student. Would you be willing to consider this lower offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, your offer of €650 is quite fair, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I have costs to cover as well. I'm willing to go down to €675 per month. This should be a reasonable compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counteroffer of €675 is more acceptable. It's closer to what I had hoped for. Considering the central location and the amenities, I believe this could be a good deal. I'm willing to accept this price. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
